thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 7 of 122
thread.title: Carol McCallum

author: Carol McCallum
title: Carol McCallum
text: Booked return flights with Dialaflight from Edinburgh to Perth, WA via Doha with Qatar. The whole experience was seamless. Reggie helped me choose the best flight option for me, and organised my visa. Email confirmation was instant, I received a courtesy call to ask if everything was in order shortly before my departure date and the whole process was a pleasure. Would highly recommend.
